articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Order Awarded to Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Order of DPRK Friendship 1st Class was awarded to Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming.
					 He has worked hard for the steady strengthening and development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and China.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sri Lankan President
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Mahinda Rajapaksa, President of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Sri Lanka would continue to grow stronger, Kim in the message sincerely wished the President greater success in his noble work for the country's political stability and development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Sri Lankan PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Sri Lankan PM
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Kim Yong Il Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Ratnasiri Wickremanawake, Prime Minister of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of its independence.
					The message wished the Prime Minister good health and happiness and him and the Sri Lankan government greater success in their work to achieve the country's economic development and stabilize the people's life.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Mozambican FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Mozambican FM
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Oldemiro Baloi on his reappointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in his future work.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of 4.15 Innovation
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of 4.15 Innovation
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of the start of the movement of the April 15 technical innovation shock brigade.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il and Choe Thae Bok and leading officials of ministries and national institutions, officials concerned and members of the shock brigade here.
					
					 A report was made by Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission who doubles as chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					
					The reporter recalled that General Secretary Kim Jong Il initiated the above-said movement involving technicians and producers in January, Juche 69 (1980) true to the lofty intention of President
						 Kim Il Sung and referred to the shining successes registered in the mass drive to bring about technical innovations over the last three decades.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 There have been such scientific and technological achievements which pushed back the frontiers of science and technology as the perfection of the Juche iron production system, the construction of UHP electric arc furnaces of Korean style, the placing of the production of magnesia clinker on a Juche basis and the introduction of CNC technology to super-large machine tools, which are associated with the persevering efforts, enthusiasm and patriotic devotion of the officials and members of the shock brigade.
					
					 The reporter called upon them to make a tangible contribution to the development of the nation's economy and science and technology and glorify Songun Korea before the world by using brains and introducing new technologies and thus creditably perform their mission and duty as staunch revolutionaries and vanguard in carrying out the technical revolution.
					
					 He underscored the need to intensify the mass technical innovation movement for setting new standards and records to resolve in time the scientific and technological problems arising in speeding up the production and construction in the respective sectors and at the respective units.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Held
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Held
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Korean film show took place at Taedongmun Cinema Wednesday to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were officials in charge of cultural relations of various embassies here.
					
					 Paek Han Su, vice-chairman of the State Film Commission, officials concerned and creators and artistes in the movie field were on hand.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean feature film "The Name Given by the Era."

articles.title: Academic Titles and Degrees Awarded
articles.content:
Academic Titles and Degrees Awarded
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- State academic titles and degrees were conferred on intellectuals, who have made achievements in scientific research and education of the rising generation, on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 A ceremony of awarding them took place here on Tuesday.
					
					 The title of academician was conferred on Ri Jong Uk, a researcher of Kim Il Sung University, the title of candidate academician on Ko Yong Hae, a teacher of the university, and professorship on Sin Yong Hun, vice-rector of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Jong Yong Thaek, rector of Rajin University of Marine Transport, Om Yong Il, room chief of the Forestry Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, and others.
					
					 Also, doctorate went to Yu Kwang Ryol, a teacher of Kim Po Hyon University, Jong Chol, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and others and associate professorship to eight persons.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Festival Preparations Get into Stride
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Festival Preparations Get into Stride
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 14th Kimjongilia Festival are going on in real earnest in the Democratic People Republic of Korea with the birthday of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il (February 16) approaching.
					 Ri Yong Je, a department director of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, told KCNA that tens of thousands of Kimjongilia pots will be displayed in the festival. It will be participated in by organs of the armed forces, commissions and ministries of the cabinet, national institutions and many other units and people of all social strata including youth and schoolchildren, he said. It will also be attended by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other overseas Koreans' organizations, overseas compatriots and foreign organizations and individuals.
					
					 The festival theme is "Kimjongilia, Immortal Flower in Full Blossom under Songun Sun."
					
					 Stands have been prepared to be arranged in the venue and its interior and exterior facelifted.
					
					 The applicants for the festival are bringing into full bloom potted flowers even in the unusual cold.
					
					 Meanwhile, each province is also busy with preparations for a Kimjongilia show.
					
					Kimjongilia flowers are opening at Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses, too, throughout the country.
					
					 The festival will fully demonstrate the strong will of the Korean army and people to build a thriving nation without fail under the Songun-based leadership of Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly great man revered by all people.

articles.title: KCNA Calls for Establishing Peace-keeping Regime
articles.content:
KCNA Calls for Establishing Peace-keeping Regime 
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- No sooner had the DPRK made public its crucial proposal in which it expressed its readiness to conclude a peace treaty to the parties to the Armistice Agreement than the proposal earned positive support and sympathy from the international community. 
					 Peace is dearer to the Korean people than to any others as they have been exposed to the constant danger of war for more than half a century. 
					
					 The DPRK's proposal is the most proper and realistic one for bringing about a new phase in giving substantial guarantee for defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula, putting an end to foreign interference and settling the issue of reunification on the principle of the right to national self-determination and the most reasonable one for achieving peace and development in Asia and other parts of the world. 
					
					 But some quarters are putting a brake on the moves to put it into practice, asserting that "it is still premature to conclude such treaty" and "it is necessary for the DPRK to return to the six-party talks, to begin with." In a word, their assertion is that the nuclear issue should be taken up before anything else. 
					
					 What they assert is to build a house without a foundation. This cannot be construed otherwise than rhetoric intended to play down the realistic and reasonable nature of the proposal and stand in the way of achieving peace and stability and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Discussion on the issue of establishing a peace-keeping regime is urgently required to realize in a coordinated manner the denuclearization, normalization of relations, energy compensation and establishment of a peace-keeping regime and other clauses stipulated in the Sept. 19 joint statement.
					
					 It is illogical to assert that the establishment of the peace-keeping regime is the matter to be taken up after the nuclear issue is settled. This is nothing but an artifice to dodge the proposal.
					
					 The talks had been held for several years by the modality of discussing the denuclearization before taking up the issue of establishing a peace-keeping regime only to end in failure. This stark reality goes to prove that anything that started without confidence can never yield good results. 
					
					 No problem can be solved unless confidence is built among the parties concerned. 
					
					 It is the purpose of the DPRK's proposal to put an end to the vicious cycle of distrust and build confidence to push forward the denuclearization. 
					
					 Now is the time to replace the AA by a peace treaty. 
					
					 An early conclusion of a peace treaty to replace the AA would make it possible to turn the acute belligerent relations between the DPRK and the U.S. into those of peace and confidence and achieve lasting peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 An early opening of the negotiations for concluding a peace treaty is very proper and reasonable both in the light of the tense situation prevailing on the peninsula, the requirement of the year which marks the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War and the present trend of the development of the international situation. 
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty would help build confidence between the DPRK and the U.S. to put an end to the hostile relations between them and put a strong impetus to the denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Claim to Tok Islets Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Claim to Tok Islets Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries were reported to have "discovered" a map dating back to the latter half of the 19th century, making much fuss, asserting they obtained a big "treasure." They will reportedly make preparations for "striking back" at somebody, regarding it as a ground for asserting "dominium" over Tok Islets.
					 Leading papers Wednesday in signed commentaries observe that it had already been irrefutably proved by historic facts and data and geographical and legal grounds that Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea.
					
					 The commentaries demand the Japanese reactionaries drop their foolish daydream, bearing in mind that any attempt to grab the islets would lead them to self-destruction.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun notes it is the height of shamelessness for Japan to far-fetchedly insist that other's land "belongs to it."
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 By grabbing the islets Japan seeks to pave the way for staging a comeback to Korea and, furthermore, realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are so brazen-faced and brigandish as to undisguisedly reveal again their wild ambition to grab the islets, taking advantage of the above-mentioned map printed in the West in the 19th century.
					
					 With nothing can Japan justify its "claim" to Tok Islets and its wild ambition can never come true.
					
					 The Korean people will strongly react to the Japanese reactionaries' brigandish moves to grab the islets.
					
					 Minju Joson says the Japanese reactionaries are deliberately escalating the dispute over Tok Islets in a bid to strain the situation and stage a comeback to Korea under this pretext, adding this is, however, no more than a daydream.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- How to approach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serves as a barometer to distinguish the harmony between the north and the south from confrontation and reunification from division. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said historic declarations are the declarations on national independence and those on national unity in which the north and the south promised to solve the issue of national reunification on the basis of the spirit of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The inter-Korean relations should be developed by the concerted efforts of the Koreans on the basis of the declarations under any circumstances. If the south Korean authorities persist in kicking up the racket of confrontation in league with foreign forces while denying the June 15 joint declaration, the inter-Korean relations will never be improved. 
					
					 Those who struggle for the implementation of the above-said declarations are patriots at present whereas those who negate them are anti-reunification elements. 
					
					 Whoever truly wants the reunification and prosperity of the country should respect the inter-Korean declarations and sincerely implement them. One should not rely on foreign forces but take the stand of national independence and settle the issue of inter-Korean relations on the principle of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The south Korean authorities should meet the desire of the fellow countrymen and the need of the era for improving the inter-Korean relations and bringing about a landmark turn in national reunification as indicated by the declarations, concludes the article.

articles.title: Crackdown on Pomminryon Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown on Pomminryon Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The civic and public joint measure committee against the suppression of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 29, slashing at the puppet police crackdown upon the reunification movement forces.
					 Speakers at the conference recalled that the Pusan District Police Agency issued summons several times for three persons including Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon who has been released after being detained on charges of violation of the "National Security Law."
					
					 They charged that the police have taken such repressive action for the reason that those persons participated in the rally held in Pusan to commemorate the 19th anniversary of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 It is the far-fetched assertion to charge their participation in the annual rally again as violation of the NSL, they said.
					
					 Through this action, the police openly betrayed an intention to ceaselessly crack down upon the reunification movement forces including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, they said, urging the police to roll back their repressive measures and stop the unreasonable suppression at once.

articles.title: KPA Statement Supported in Britain
articles.content:
KPA Statement Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- British organizations expressed support for the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint statement on Jan. 26 branded the south Korean puppet defense minister's reactionary utterances about "preemptive strike" at the DPRK as reckless remarks of a war maniac that may provoke another war on the Korean Peninsula and invite the third World War.
					
					 His remarks are quite contrary to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and they are throwing a wet blanket over the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, the joint statement pointed out, and said:
					
					 It is a matter entirely pertaining to sovereignty for the DPRK, a dignified independent and sovereign state, to have access to self-defensive nuclear deterrent and the south Korean puppet authorities have no qualification to talk about the DPRK's nuclear deterrent as well as "preemptive strike" theory.
					
					 We fully support the stand of the KPA General Staff to take prompt and decisive military actions against any attempt of the south Korean puppet authorities and blow up the major targets including the commanding center, a cancer-like entity threatening independence, peace and progress, in order to defend the sovereignty, dignity and honor of the DPRK and its people-centered socialist system.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in a statement on January 27 expressed full support for the said statement and demanded that the south Korean puppet authorities stop all provocative acts and retract any reckless remarks at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in DR Congo
						
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, was formed in the the Democratic Republic of Congo on Jan. 26.
					 At its inaugural ceremony Mienze Kiaku, deputy secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, was elected honorary chairman of the preparatory committee and Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, its chairman.
					
					 The committee announced a plan for political and cultural events to be held on the occasion of February 16.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk visited an army unit on a freezing day of February Juche 38 (1949).
					 Calling at a barracks, she asked an officer and duty private if the barracks was not cold and told the commander of the unit to take good care of the soldiers so as not to feel cold as all of them were as valuable as treasure of the country.
					
					 The commander was touched much by her deep concern for the soldiers' life.
					
					 After looking around the barracks, she watched sleeping soldiers one by one again.
					
					 Seeing a soldier sleeping, not fully wrapped with his blanket, she covered him with it in person, afraid that he might have a cold. She then earnestly requested the commander again to pay great attention to the life of the soldiers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige Empresa Pesquera Taehung de Wonphyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige Empresa Pesquera Taehung de Wonphyong
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Empresa Pesquera Taehung de Wonphyong del distrito de Kumya de la provincia de  Hamgyong del Sur.
					  Luego de escuchar en la sala de presentacion del historial las explicaciones de la historia del desarrollo de la empresa, el Dirigente recorrio el taller de procesamiento y otros procesos productivos y los pescados procesados de diversos tipos enterandose detalladamente del estado de equipamiento tecnico y de produccion.
					
					  Evaluo muchos trabajos que realizaron los obreros de la empresa empleando plenamente su espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza en los proyectos para aumentar la productividad por cuenta propia incluyendo la construccion del muelle.
					
					  Al examinar minuciosamente la frescura de diversos productos de pescados hechos en la empresa, reconocio los esfuerzos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de ella que se esfuerzan activamente por suministrar al pueblo mayor cantidad de pescados y sus productos frescos procesados en todas las estaciones del ano.
					
					  Dijo que desarrollar rapido la pesqueria en nuestro pais, cuyos tres lados son banados por el mar, explotando y utilizando los recursos pesqueros tiene capital importancia para incrementar el poderio economico del pais y fomentar el bienestar material del pueblo.
					
					  Hay que materializar cabalmente la politica del partido de desarrollar paralelamente la pesca de gran escala y las de mediana y pequena magnitudes para incrementar decisivamente la produccion de pescados, subrayo e ilumino la direccion y los remedios para el particular.
					
					  Enseno que a fin de ajustar la pesca a la situacion cambiada de distribucion de peces, es preciso establecer estrictamente el cientifico sistema de pesca, aplicar ampliamente los avanzados instrumentos y metodos pesqueros e impulsar al mismo tiempo con vistas al futuro la exploracion de nuevas zonas pesqueras.
					
					  Es importante capturar los peces de diversas especies y, al mismo tiempo, suministrar los frescos pescados a los habitantes, agrego y enfatizo que para este fin, es preciso disponerse en lo suficiente de modernos equipos refrigeradores.
					
					  La potente industria pesada, que hemos preparado con grandes esfuerzos apretando el cinturon, comenzo a funcionar a toda fuerza dando pruebas de su colosal potencialidad, y por consiguiente, se ha abierto un horizonte amplio para desarrollar de manera vertiginosa los dominios directamente relacionados con la vida del pueblo como la industria ligera, la agricultura y la pesqueria, senalo.
					
					Llamo encarecidamente a todas las empresas pesqueras a contribuir activamente a abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera al lograr un gran cambio para materializar con brillantez el proposito del partido de imprimir un viraje decisivo en la vida del pueblo en este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang, Ri Jae Il, Jon Il Chun y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Liu Xiaoming recibe orden de Core
articles.content:
Liu Xiaoming recibe orden de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- La Orden de Amistad de primera clase de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue otorgada al embajador de la Republica Popular China en Corea, Liu Xiaoming, quien se esforzo por el fortalecimiento incesante de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-China.
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de otorgamiento de la orden.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, y otros funcionarios, asi como los miembros de la embajada china.

articles.title: Acto por 30 aniversario de inicio de movimiento de brigada 15 de Abril
articles.content:
Acto por 30 aniversario de inicio de movimiento de brigada 15 de Abril
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 30o aniversario del inicio del movimiento de la Brigada de la Innovacion Tecnica 15 de Abril.
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, los cuadros directivos de los ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios interesados y los  integrantes de brigada en la capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias y del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea, Ri Ja Bang.
					
					El informante senalo que en acato al sublime proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente
						 Kim Jong Il dio iniciativa en enero del 69 (1980) de la Era Juche al movimiento de la Brigada en cuestion que incorpora a los tecnicos y las masas productoras y agrego que a lo largo de estos 30 anos pasados se lograron orgullosos exitos en la innovacion tecnica masiva.
					
					Subrayo que los exitos cientifico-tecnicos que conquistaron la tecnologia de punta incluyendo el perfeccionamiento del sistema de produccion de hierro Juche, la construccion del horno electrico UHP al estilo coreano, la jucheanizacion de la produccion de clinker de magnesia y la aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC en las maquinas herramientas de tipo ultragrande, son frutos de las interminables investigaciones y los esfuerzos abnegados de los  funcionarios y los brigadistas.
					
					Asevero que los funcionarios y los brigadistas deben contribuir verdaderamente al desarrollo de la economia, la ciencia y tecnologia del pais  desplegando la batalla de inteligencia y la tecnica, y exaltar a todo el mundo Corea del Songun y asi cumplir con la mision y el deber de firmes revolucionarios y de vanguardias en el cumplimiento de la revolucion tecnica.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de resolver a tiempo los problemas cientifico-tecnicos para acelerar la produccion y la construccion en sus respectivos sectores y unidades mediante el despliegue energico del movimiento por la innovacion tecnica masiva para crear nuevas normas y nuevos records.

articles.title: Se impulsan preparativos del XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Se impulsan preparativos del XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
						
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) --  En Corea se prepara activamente el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias que tendra lugar en ocasion del 16 de febrero (cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					  Segun Ri Yong Je, director de departamento del Comite Coreano de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia, en el certamen se exhibiran decenas de miles de flores cultivadas con esmero por los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, los comites del Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios, las instituciones centrales y otras muchas unidades, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares, el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon y otras entidades de coreanos y compatriotas en ultramar, entidades y personalidades extranjeras.
					
					  Conforme al tema del festival "Inmortal flor Kimjongilia que abre sus petalos rojos hacia el Sol del Songun" se ubicaran de manera especifica en la sede del festival los mostradores que reflejan la idea de que bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il se abriran sin falta las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, y la orgullosa realidad de Corea del Songun donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo.
					
					  Ahora, se impulsan con rapidez las labores para emplazar los mostradores de acuerdo con el diseno de formacion del lugar del festival mientras se efectua bien el trabajo para acondicionar excelentemente el interior y exterior de la sede.
					
					  Todas las unidades e individuos, que participaran en este evento, dedican toda sinceridad y esfuerzos por hacer florecer plenamente las flores del Sol pese al frio intenso sin precedente.
					
					Tambien, todas las provincias hacen bien los preparativos para las exhibiciones de Kimjongilias. 
					
					En los "invernaculos de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias" estas flores abren  de par en par sus petalos exhalando perfume agradable.
					
					El festival manifestara ampliamente al interior y exterior del pais la indoblegable voluntad e impetu de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que bajo la direccion del gran hombre simpar a quien venera todo el mundo, avanzan a pasos firmes para construir la gran potencia prospera socialista enarbolando la gran bandera del Songun.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan la perseverante ambicion de Japon sobre islote Tok
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan la perseverante ambicion de Japon sobre islote Tok
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ATCC) -- En estos dias, los reaccionarios japoneses arman escandalo con el recien "descubierto" mapa hecho en la segunda mitad del siglo 19 como si hubieran hallado un gran "tesoro".
					Ademas, estan preparados para el "contraataque" a alguien tomando ese mapa como argumento de su insistencia en el "derecho de posesion" del islote Tok.
					
					  En sendos comentarios individuales publicados hoy, los periodicos centrales destacan que ya fue comprobado a mas no poder por los hechos historicos y fundamentos geograficos y legales que el islote Tok es un territorio intocable de Corea.
					
					  Advierten que los reaccionarios japoneses deben dejarse de su vana ilusion al tener presente que lo que buscaran con la extorsion del islote Tok es la autodestruccion.
					
					  El periodico Rodong Sinmun senala que es demasiado dura la cara de Japon que insiste obstinadamente en que es "suya" la tierra ajena, y prosigue:
					
					  Japon intenta retomar el camino de agresion a Corea al despojar y ocupar ese islote y realizar a la larga su antiguo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses volvieron a exponer su ambicion de usurpar el islote Tok pretextando el mapa hecho en el Occidente en el siglo 19. Esto es la manifestacion del extremado descaro y la naturaleza de bandido de ellos.
					
					  No se puede justificar por nada el reclamo de Japon por el "derecho de posesion" del islote Tok ni se realizara jamas su ambicion de arrebatarlo.
					
					  Es que el pueblo coreano se enfrentara rotundamente a tales maniobras de Japon.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson subraya que si bien los reaccionarios japoneses intentan crear y agravar intencionalmente el litigio territorial sobre ese islote para empeorar la situacion y reagredir a Corea pretextandolo, esto no pasa de ser una ambicion nunca realizable.
